name: Brazilian Curly
description:
Our Brazilian hair is only superior quality. It is truly authentic and imported directly from Brazil. This hair is luscious, long lasting, and easily maintained. It behaves very well when styled. Key Features are its strength and density. The hair comes in various curly or wavy textures as no one women's hair is the same. The hair is versatile and can be easily styled for many different looks. It is excellent for people with African ancestry, as it looks very natural, yet manageable.Our International Hair Tresses have the lush, exotic texture you want, with the high quality and easy maintenance of 100% virgin hair that you demand. Achieve premium, red carpet-worthy styles that will keep heads turning with our naturally straight, wavy or curly textures. The hair comes in shades of honey brown, caramel and dark chocolate tones.You can feel confident knowing each selection has been drawn from one donor, for consistent color and grade, and will be tangle-free and naturally strong. 

Hair Material: 100% Virgin Human Remy Hair 

Hair Grade:  AAAA(Virgin Remy Human 

Hair Color: The main color is Natural color. *Please consult a professional hairstylist for custom colors.*

Texture Pattern: Body wave,Deep wave, Natural straight

name: Malaysian Body Wave
description:
Malaysian Remy Human Hair comes from the Malaysian Race. Malaysian hair is a must add staple when it comes to human hair. Malaysian hair is naturally super straight or very slight wave, also fine but strong. It's a great option for any texture.
The Malaysian hair texture can best described as more silky and finer than Indian hair. Malaysian hair is at the opposite side of the Chinese Virgin Hair spectrum. It most resembles European hair because of its finer silky strands. Great Option if you don't want to spend the bucks on Virgin Russian European Hair Extensions. Our International Hair Tresses have the lush, exotic texture you want, with the high quality and easy maintenance of 100% virgin hair that you demand. Achieve premium, red carpet-worthy styles that will keep heads turning with our naturally straight, wavy or curly textures. The hair comes in shades of honey brown, caramel and dark chocolate tones.You can feel confident knowing each selection has been drawn from one donor, for consistent color and grade, and will be tangle-free and naturally strong. 

Hair Material: 100% Virgin Human Remy Hair 

Hair Grade:  AAAA(Virgin Remy Human 

Hair Color: The main color is Natural color. *Please consult a professional hairstylist for custom colors.*

Texture Pattern: Body wave,Deep wave, Natural straight

name: Peruvian Deep Wave
description:
Peruvian hair is a our best kept secret. Peruvian hair is luxurious in any texture especially natural straight textures. When you wear our Peruvian the world will take notice. Heads will turn to take double looks. Peruvian hair is soft and naturally shiny, best worn in natural straight or wavy textures. Our International Hair Tresses have the lush, exotic texture you want, with the high quality and easy maintenance of 100% virgin hair that you demand.
